I completely forgot to add this to the post. I LOVE IT. I had to have something that attached to the desk since it is height adjustable and I didn't want cords to inadvertently disconnect if I put it in standing height and the machine was on the ground. It fits the bill perfectly.

WRITING.TITLE: Turned my GHK M4 into a MK18

WRITING.TEXT: Haha I know, the Madbull licensed DD rail is off\-color.
Yea, real EOtech amp; magnifier. The flashlight is a Surefire M300 Scout /w Surefire dual pressure pad.
I know :\(
Yes, used this: [https://www.evike.com/products/28579/](https://www.evike.com/products/28579/) It's a pain in the ass, but it lets you put the Madbull rail on :\)
[https://danieldefense.com/furniture.html](https://danieldefense.com/furniture.html)
3x magnification and it just flips to the side when you don't need it

Painted up my GHK from a few days ago: [https://www.reddit.com/r/airsoft/comments/8atf71/turned\_my\_ghk\_m4\_into\_a\_mk18/](https://www.reddit.com/r/airsoft/comments/8atf71/turned_my_ghk_m4_into_a_mk18/)

[https://danieldefense.com/furniture/daniel\-defense\-collapsible\-buttstock\-pistol\-grip\-vertical\-foregrip\-combo\-mil\-spec.html](https://danieldefense.com/furniture/daniel-defense-collapsible-buttstock-pistol-grip-vertical-foregrip-combo-mil-spec.html)
FYI \- the buttstock won't work for AEGs since it's not for storing a lipo.
I'm actually not sure, something I had lying around in a box that had a QD flash hider. I'm switching it over to a QD PTS one shortly.
Melt a bit of butter and a drizzle it over the steak right before serving.
Yup!

I actually didn't change any of the externals other than the stock and the vertical grip I added. The newer 416s are running free\-floating Geissele rails like this replica instead of the standard quad rails.
It's a replica Geissele rail that comes on the 416 Delta Custom.
I really like the aggressive look of quad rails too, but these rails are lighter!
Thanks!
Yea, it's a real EOTech.
